<hr>

Before attending the workshop, make sure to install both R and RStudio per instructions found at the bottom of [the main workshop page](https://jtande.github.io/2019-06-25-ColbyCollege/).


## [Day 1](day01.html)

On the first day of the R workshop, you will be introduced to the following topics:

 * Variables (aka objects)
 * R core data types: these will include **integers**, **double**, **character** and **logical**
 * R data structures: these will be limited to **vectors** and **data frames**
 * Good R coding practices
 * Reading a CSV file into R


 
## [Day 2](day02.html)

On the second day of the R workshop, you will be introduced to the following topics:

 * Extending R's functionality with packages
 * Reading Excel files into an R session
 * Manipulating data tables
 * Visualizing data
